description: The Birth of Venus is a painting by the Italian artist Sandro Botticelli, between 1445 â€“ 1510.
It depicts the goddess Venus arriving at the shore after her birth, when she had emerged from the sea fully-grown.
The painting is in the Uffizi Gallery in Florence, Italy.
disclaimer: This is a reimagined digital adaptation of Botticelli's 'The Birth of Venus,' crafted specifically for an enhanced parallax effect. This image is not the original artwork.
